answer: Campus Café: A casual café serving coffee, sandwiches, and pastries. Location: Student Union Building, First Floor. Hours: Monday-Friday 7am-7pm, Weekends 9am-5pm. Contact: (555) 123-4567
The Dining Hall: The main dining facility with a variety of food stations. Location: Residence Hall Complex. Hours: Monday-Friday 7am-9pm, Weekends 8am-8pm. Contact: (555) 123-4568
Pizza Place: Quick pizza by the slice or whole pies. Location: College Avenue, across from the Humanities Building. Hours: Monday-Sunday 11am-2am. Contact: (555) 123-4569
Library Starbucks: Full-service Starbucks location. Location: Main Library, First Floor. Hours: Monday-Friday 7am-10pm, Weekends 9am-8pm. Contact: (555) 123-4570
